channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【EP125: How does Garbage Collection work? 】EP125：垃圾收集是如何工作的？
item.description: 【This week’s system design refresher:】本周的系统设计复习：

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Scaling the API Layer】扩展 API 层的速成课程
item.description: 【The API (Application Programming Interface) layer serves as the backbone for communication between clients and the backend services in modern internet-based applications.】API（应用程序编程接口）层是现代基于互联网的应用程序中客户端和后端服务之间通信的支柱。

item.title: 【Trillions of Indexes: How Uber’s LedgerStore Supports Such Massive Scale】数万亿个索引：Uber 的 LedgerStore 如何支持如此大规模
item.description: 【Try Fully Managed Apache Airflow and get certified for FREE (Sponsored)】尝试完全托管的 Apache Airflow 并免费获得认证（赞助）

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Load Balancers for Scaling】用于扩展的负载均衡器速成课程
item.description: 【Over the years, load balancers have become a crucial component of system architecture, acting as the front-line gatekeepers that distribute incoming network traffic across multiple servers.】多年来，负载均衡器已成为系统架构的重要组成部分，充当在多个服务器之间分配传入网络流量的一线守门人。

item.title: 【EP127: 20 Popular Open Source Projects Started or Supported By Big Companies 】EP127：20 个由大公司发起或支持的流行开源项目
item.description: 【This week’s system design refresher:】本周的系统设计复习：

item.title: 【Counting Billions of Content Usage at Canva】统计 Canva 数十亿内容的使用情况
item.description: 【Hands-on Rust Developer Workshop: Build a Low-Latency Social Media App (Sponsored)】Rust 开发人员实践研讨会：构建低延迟社交媒体应用程序（赞助）

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Architectural Scalability】架构可扩展性速成课程
item.description: 【In today's interconnected world, software applications have a global reach, serving users from diverse geographical locations.】在当今互联的世界中，软件应用程序具有全球影响力，为来自不同地理位置的用户提供服务。

item.title: 【EP126: The Ultimate Kafka 101 You Cannot Miss 】EP126：你不能错过的终极卡夫卡101

item.title: 【Millions of Requests Per Hour: SoundCloud’s Microservices Evolution】每小时数百万个请求：SoundCloud 的微服务演变
item.description: 【How to monitor containerized applications in Azure (Sponsored)】如何监控 Azure 中的容器化应用程序（赞助）

item.title: 【A Crash Course on Scaling the Data Layer】扩展数据层的速成课程
item.description: 【The scalability of a system is heavily dependent on the data layer.】系统的可扩展性很大程度上取决于数据层。
